about_the_game:
'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a doomed Earth and exploring a new world.
You can take off into space in a rocket and explore the unknown, experiencing sad hardships and the limitations of humanity on your way to a new world through a swingby that utilizes the gravity of the stars.
The game offers a variety of challenges. You must use your swingby to avoid obstacles and reach your destination, always facing new challenges.
Make your way through different levels, such as a black hole with extreme gravity or a space station.
As you play the game, you will have fun exploring a new world with a sad story.
detailed_description:
'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a doomed Earth and exploring a new world.
You can take off into space in a rocket and explore the unknown, experiencing sad hardships and the limitations of humanity on your way to a new world through a swingby that utilizes the gravity of the stars.
The game offers a variety of challenges. You must use your swingby to avoid obstacles and reach your destination, always facing new challenges.
Make your way through different levels, such as a black hole with extreme gravity or a space station.
As you play the game, you will have fun exploring a new world with a sad story.

name: Bye Bye Swingby

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1060
  • Storage: 18100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 2070
  • Storage: 18100 MB available space

short_description: 'Bye Bye Swingby' is a fresh and unique simulation game that tells a sad story of escaping a destroyed Earth and exploring a new world. Take a rocket into space and use the gravity of the stars to travel to new worlds in Swingby.
